trends: There have been 188 other sightings in Austin
There was one other sighting in Austin on or around April 17th 2008
Summary: It was cloudy and it came out of the clouds at about 300 feet.
divs: Sighting DetailsThursday night april 17th at 10:05 pm.It was cloudy that night with low clouds and we were standing outside because we had been seeing lights in space all week but that night we could not see into space because it was cloudy.On Monday we were looking at the three star triangle in space and we saw what appeared to be a light like a star move thru the triangle from south to north and thirty minutes later it went back thru from north to south.We were outside talking about what we had seen on monday night when all of the sudden It came out of the clouds close to us and it was shaped like a V and it had lights around it and it was transparent white looking and it came towards us at about 300 feet in the air and we got a very good look at it.When it came over us it was moving slow and it had lights around it and they changed the lights and went from looking like a V to a diamond shape and it was totally silent and after it passed over us we looked at it from behind and we saw a narrow white light that was about 50 feet wide and then it turned the light off and we saw a black craft about 50 feet wide and it went back into the clouds.Three of us saw it and we came to the conclusion that it wasn't from this world it was incredible i have never seen anything like it ever.Tonight we are going to be looking into space with a camcorder so we can record anything that looks unusual.
